import React from 'react' class PharmacoTool extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { dci:[], ddmt:'' } this.handlchange = this.handlchange.bind(this) this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this) this.didDciMatch = this.didDciMatch.bind(this) this.addDrug = this.addDrug.bind(this) } handlchange(event){ const {name ,value } = event.target this.setState({ [name]:value }) this.dciMatch(this.state.dci) } handleSubmit(event){ event.preventDefault(); console.log(JSON.stringify(this.state)) } addDrug(){ } didDciMatch(mdci){ console.log(mdci) } render(){ return(

) } } export default PharmacoTool;
